I think KappaG9 works for Nullsoft as using this serial (or the crack found on this site) on the new version 3.31 totally stops the program from working and uninstalling back to this version stops it from working.  If you have done this (if you are on Leopard) go back to version 3.23, register with the crack (found on this site) then go to Library/PreferancePanes and ctrl click on the Connect360.prefpane and make sure every user has full read write accress.  That will make it work.

After seeing this working on the 360, its no where near as good as streaming from XBMC on the Xbox 1. The video file support is awful and the playback for the supported files is not great quality.  Compare that to XCMC and you can see.  Still, I have to say on the plus side, the communication from Mac to the 360 was effortless.
